sentences.en: As soon as comparatively, the pig cattle and sheep and so on other meats abdicate plan.
sentences.cn: 相比之下, 猪牛羊等其他肉类就稍逊一筹.

sentences.en: Before 3 months, abdicate of Zhi Wei soup and home are happy part company.
sentences.cn: 3个月前, 智威汤逊和家乐分道扬镳.

sentences.en: But abdicate all responsibility for investing and monitoring their hard - earned savings.
sentences.cn: 但在投资和监管自己辛苦赚来的积蓄时,人们不能将所有的责任一推了之.

sentences.en: Did the king abdicate or was he deposed?
sentences.cn: 那个国王是自己放弃王位还是被废的?

sentences.en: His declining health added weight to speculation that the king would soon abdicate.
sentences.cn: 国王日益恶化的健康状况加强了人们对他即将退位的猜测.

sentences.en: If the king does not abdicate, he will have to be dethroned.
sentences.cn: 如果国王自己不退位, 就必须把他赶下台.

sentences.en: If the King does not abdicate, he will have to be dethroned.
sentences.cn: 如果国王不退位那他只能被废黜了.

sentences.en: In February 12, Qingdi was forced to abdicate.
sentences.cn: 同年2月12日, 清帝被迫退位.

sentences.en: King Alfonso XIII abdicated in favour of his eldest son.
sentences.cn: 国王阿方索十三世把王位让给了长子。

sentences.en: Many parents simply abdicate all responsibility for their children.
sentences.cn: 许多父母对孩子简直是完全撒手不管。

sentences.en: Puyi , who is just like an outcast, read out the abdicate rescript.
sentences.cn: 如同丧家之犬的溥仪也随之神情沮丧地宣读了退位主诏书.

sentences.en: The aging founder of the university decided to abdicate.
sentences.cn: 该大学年事已高的创始人决定引退.

sentences.en: The king was forced to abdicate the throne .

trans.tran_en: to give up the position of being king or queen
